title: Pom Cornbread Stuffing
summary: Need a vegetarian side dish? Pom Cornbread Stuffing could be an amazing recipe to try. One serving contains 302 calories, 5g of protein, and 15g of fat. For $1.06 per serving, this recipe covers 10% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 12. It is perfect for Thanksgiving. 3 people have tried and liked this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 1 hour and 10 minutes. A mixture of butter, chicken broth, egg, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. This recipe is typical of Southern cuisine. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 32%. This score is not so tremendous. Try Cornbread Stuffing, Cornbread Stuffing, and Cornbread Stuffing for similar recipes.

winePairing.pairingText: Cornbread on the menu? Try pairing with Riesling, Sparkling Wine, and Zinfandel. In general, there are a few rules that will help you pair wine with southern food. Food-friendly riesling or sparkling white wine will work with many fried foods, while zinfandel is great with barbecued fare. You could try Chateau Ste. Michelle Riesling. Reviewers quite like it with a 4.4 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 10 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Chateau Ste. Michelle Riesling
productMatches.description: #14 Wine Enthusiast Top 100 Best Buys of 2018Chateau Ste. Michelles' Columbia Valley Riesling is a blend of Riesling from throughout Washington’s Columbia Valley. Their goal is to craft a refreshing, flavorful, medium-dry Riesling vintage after vintage. The wine offers crisp apple aromas and flavors with subtle mineral notes. This is their “everyday Riesling” that is a pleasure to drink and easy to match with a variety of foods.Pair with fresh fruit, crab, mild cheeses, or chicken.
